meanings.definition: A compound containing two bromine atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the dibromides under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use dibromides in various experiments.
meanings.sent3: The dibromides decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The dibromides in the solution danced together like synchronized swimmers.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the dibromides made them easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: She bought several dibromides for her collection.
meanings.sent2: The lab shelves were filled with dibromides of different sizes.
meanings.sent3: The dibromides gathered for a group photo, smiling happily.
meanings.sent4: In the petri dish, the dibromides huddled together like a tiny community.
meanings.sent5: The market had a sale on dibromides, so she stocked up on them.
